title: New Champion: Night Blade
body:
this is one of my dream characters i would love to see this and unlock it as a champion in the game. These are all of the things i think you need to know:
primary role: assassin
secondary role:   ???      (fighter or a mage)
passive: after 2 attacks on a single enemy the next attack will give slow or burn for ???s (1.5s or 2.5s)
r:throws his blade in a selected direction and teleports there. if blade hits an enemy it teleports to enemy and deals normal damage.
q: does a spin attack like Garen {{champion:86}} exactly the same thing
w: stabs himself with his blade which gives him a certain amount of health ??? but also gives slow
e: ??? (possibly Master Yi's {{champion:11}} alpha strike)
lore: ??? (he has blades that are either ice or blue fire depending on the scenario so be imaginative you guys are good at that stuff)
stats: attack should be high. health around mid. ability power should be mid. and difficulty high or mid.
image: https://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/hearthstone.gamepedia.com/thumb/8/82/Nightblade_full.jpg/400px-Nightblade_full.jpg?version=255b9ab58e306f9a50459005056af46c


please add this champion to the game i would be for ever thankful
Kind regards AndrewCrafter
(Night Blade: My blade will taste your neck)
